name: Hexagon Head Bolt DIN 931
description: High tensile hex head bolt for heavy-duty applications.

name: Socket Head Cap Screw DIN 912
description: High-strength precision fastener suitable for tight spaces.

name: U-Bolt with Nuts DIN 3570
description: Standard U-bolt used primarily for supporting pipework.

name: Heavy Hex Nut ASME B18.2.2
description: Heavy hex nuts providing increased strength in structural joints.

name: Nylon Insert Lock Nut DIN 985
description: Prevents loosening under vibration and torque.

name: Flange Nut DIN 6923
description: Integrated washer flange to distribute pressure over a wider area.

name: Spring Lock Washer DIN 127
description: Provides constant tension to prevent fasteners from vibrating loose.

name: Flat Washer DIN 125
description: Standard flat washer for load distribution and surface protection.

name: Square Taper Washer
description: Used with U-profile sections to compensate for lack of parallelism.

name: Countersunk Machine Screw
description: Cross recessed countersunk flat head screw for a flush finish.

name: Self Tapping Screw
description: Pan head Phillips self-tapping screw for sheet metal.

name: Wood Screw
description: Slotted countersunk head wood screw for timber framing.

name: Precision Turned Shaft
description: Custom precision turned component tailored to specific tolerances.

name: Threaded Rod Spacer
description: Lightweight standoff spacer with internal threading.
